graph.packing
Class IntSetN1RXPFirstImprovingGraphAllMovesMaker

java.lang.Object
  graph.packing.IntSetN1RXPFirstImprovingGraphAllMovesMaker
All Implemented Interfaces:
AllChromosomeMakerIntf
public class IntSetN1RXPFirstImprovingGraphAllMovesMaker
extends java.lang.Object
implements AllChromosomeMakerIntf

class is an implementation of the AllChromosomeMakerIntf interface, and implements local search in the N_{-1+P} neighborhood of ints: a set of integers S1 is a neighbor of another set S, if S1 is the result of subtracting one member of S, and then augmenting S by as many integers as possible without violating feasibility of the solution.

Title: popt4jlib

Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2015

Company:

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ioannis T. Christou

Method Detail

createAllChromosomes

public java.util.Vector createAllChromosomes(java.lang.Object chromosome,
                                             java.util.HashMap params)
                                      throws OptimizerException
implements the N_{-1+P} neighborhood for sets of integers.

Specified by:
createAllChromosomes in interface AllChromosomeMakerIntf
Parameters:
chromosome - Object Set<Integer node-id>
params - HashMap must contain the following key-value pairs:
  • <"dls.graph", Graph g> the graph of the problem
  • <"dls.intsetneighborhoodfilter", IntSetNeighborhoodFilterIntf filter>
It may also optionally contain a pair <"dls.intsetneighborhoodmaxnodestotry", Integer max_nodes> which if present will indicate the maximum number of nodes to try to remove from the current solution in the "1RXP" local search. The filter must specify what ints to be tried for addition to the set given an int to be removed from the set.
Returns:
Vector // Vector<Set<Integer> >
Throws:
OptimizerException
